timeline.bodyText: We should remove the method in AbstractTransactionTable
timeline.author: danberindei

timeline.bodyText: We should remove isTraceEnabled() and getLog()
timeline.author: danberindei

timeline.bodyText: We should remove the if (trace) checks from tests IMO
timeline.author: danberindei

timeline.bodyText: I don't think if (log.isDebugEnabled()) is justified, there are just too few invocations.
timeline.author: danberindei

timeline.bodyText: This is wrong IMO. We shouldn't log individual chunks at DEBUG level because the number of chunks depends on the number of entries (and the chunk size).
timeline.author: danberindei

timeline.bodyText: Again, no if needed for debug logs.
timeline.author: danberindei
danberindei
danberindei

timeline.bodyText: We should remove isTraceEnabled() and getLog().
timeline.author: danberindei

timeline.bodyText: IMO we should always create the AtomicInteger, and we should only check log.isTraceEnabled() in nextTraceId().
timeline.author: danberindei

timeline.bodyText: We should remove isTraceEnabled() and getLog()
timeline.author: danberindei
danberindei

timeline.message: ISPN-12469 Do not cache trace level statically
